channel.title: Advertising
channel.description:
I know people aren't allowed recommend other sites on this forum but could someone please give me some tips into advertising my server ?.. I'm 100% sure i have it on every advertising thread on every forum and on every server status page there is... i had it on the first page on Moparscape server status page and it was 100% and on the first page but due to a power failure in my country my server went down long enough to go down to 99%... can anyone give me some tips in advertising ... ?
Thanks for helping if you do...
Nsf

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

possibly time difference.
just leave it overnight or whatever and count how many registered players you get. then you’ll see if you need to take action

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

My friends and family aren’t interested. And I did follow all those steps except the youtube step. Could it be because I’m GMT and by peaktime in the east I’m asleep I just don’t see people.? I keed,I’ll try the youtube video

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @Script Script`
item.description:
@Script wrote:

  1. Keep server update time 100%.
  2. Post the website link in your MSN / Skype sub name.
  3. Youtube videos.
  4. Advertise as much as possible, Post unique features / pictures that will get people interested.
  5. Tell your friends / family.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

  1. post your server on as many rsps communities as possible. (just google them and click like the first 10 :P)
  2. make a youtube video, have the title as great rsps july 2011!, people search on youtube for the most recent date cause then the server will still be online.
  3. patience! - players will come in time if you follow these prior steps. there are probs more but i cant think of any atm

i put mine up the other day using only method 1 got like 10 players in 1hr

Read full topic
